sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Sander Wiebing, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Details=cmd.exe /c "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat"; EventID=13; Image=C:\Windows\system32\reg.exe; EventType=SetValue; TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-1070296143-2877979003-364783958-1001\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\281f6tZQZn}
@{Details=cmd.exe /c "%APPDATA%\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat"; EventType=SetValue; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\281f6tZQZn}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects writing data into NTFS alternate data streams from powershell. Needs Script Block Logging.

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Set-Content 'C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat' -Stream Zone.Identifier -Value ''; Path=; ScriptBlockId=6de0461b-5102-46e1-9ef3-39e8148ed02e; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Content 'C:\Users\QiWURmXKplJE\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat' -Stream Zone.Identifier -Value ''; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=e3aa2ba1-987d-4212-8c45-448bc349e9a2; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential WinAPI Calls Via PowerShell Scripts
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects use of WinAPI functions in PowerShell scripts
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Dot net compiler compiles file from suspicious location
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Dot net compiler compiles file from suspicious location

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\csc.exe" /noconfig /fullpaths @"C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\2mtb1jwu.cmdline; Image=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\csc.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Script Interpreter Execution From Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious script execution in temporary folders or folders accessible by environment variables
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects instances of svchost.exe running with an unusual or uncommon command line parameter by excluding known legitimate or common patterns.
This could point at a file masquerading as svchost, a process injection, or hollowing of a legitimate svchost instance.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=%WINDIR%\system32\svchost.exe; Image=C:\Windows\system32\svchost.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "-ExecutionPolicy" flag.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

match_context.values: @{query=ipwho.is}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of attrib.exe to hide files from users.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=A5FF3845B0F55157C4AEA35E9EAE213560ACDB5C,MD5=A243BC9DB0BFB5F22E146B88BB10C58F,SHA256=0758152947F1A550E52CE8E3F9BCD988A23D36A458AD953795769B11C38FF2EA,IMPHASH=2CB38FE7D8F223D9DA50B7CBA9B95A6D; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=ATTRIB.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Attribute Utility; FileVersion=10.0.22621.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe  /K "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\betray_atlasb_8zXrkqHU.bat"  ; CommandLine=attrib  +h "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk" ; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\attrib.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.

match_context.values: @{DestinationIp=185.111.111.158; DestinationPort=443; DestinationHostname=ipwho.is; Initiated=true}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

match_context.values: @{EventID=13; EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\system32\reg.exe; Details=cmd.exe /c "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat"; TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-1070296143-2877979003-364783958-1001\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\281f6tZQZn}
@{EventType=SetValue; EventID=13; Details=cmd.exe /c "%APPDATA%\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat"; TargetObject=HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\281f6tZQZn}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential Persistence Attempt Via Run Keys Using Reg.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious command line reg.exe tool adding key to RUN key in Registry
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=979F280B1226E064CC79020B25FB8C40D9FB0008,MD5=CDB58D0BCABE76AFC60428F364834463,SHA256=411AE446FE37B30C0727888C7FA5E88994A46DAFD41AA5B3B06C9E884549AFDE,IMPHASH=1085BD82B37A225F6D356012D2E69C3D; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=reg.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Registry Console Tool; FileVersion=10.0.22621.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe  /K "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\betray_atlasb_8zXrkqHU.bat"  ; CommandLine=reg  add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v "281f6tZQZn" /t REG_SZ /d "cmd.exe /c \"C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\QUueagyccPMk\SQgmtjJNOpizCSxP.bat\"" /f ; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\reg.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects execution of "csc.exe" to compile .NET code. Attackers often leverage this to compile code on the fly and use it in other stages.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\csc.exe" /noconfig /fullpaths @"C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\2mtb1jwu.cmdline; Image=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\csc.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
When C# is compiled dynamically, a .cmdline file will be created as a part of the process.
Certain processes are not typically observed compiling C# code, but can do so without touching disk.
This can be used to unpack a payload for execution

match_context.values: @{TargetFilename=C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\2mtb1jwu.cmdline}
@{TargetFilename=%TEMP%\haky1xvj\haky1xvj.cmdline}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Get the processes that are running on the local computer.

attributes.magic: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with very long lines (35391u), with CRLF line terminators

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered unknown. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (ipwho .is)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (ipwho .is)"; dns.query; content:"ipwho.is"; nocase; bsize:8; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2037042; rev:2; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_06_21, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_11_26, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature detects base64 encoded Powershell directives.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs
